# Prerequesites {-}

## R version 

Working with the **latest R release** (at least) or even better, with the **R-devel** version (currently **R 4.4**) 
is a requirement for this workshop. 

Find instructions on how to install it here: 

- [macOS](https://mac.r-project.org/)
- [Windows](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/rdevel.html)
- [Linux](http://singmann.org/installing-r-devel-on-linux/)

## R packages
 
- Bioconductor version 3.19 (if possible) or 3.18. 

## RStudio

Ideally latest version.
